data.Sentence_cn: 极好的不在犯罪现场的证据
“在凶杀发生的时候，我正坐在8点钟开往伦敦的火车上。”那人说。
data.Sentence: 'At the time the murder was committed, I was travelling on the 8 o'clock train to London,' said the man.

data.Sentence_cn: “您总是赶这样早的火车？”探长问。
data.Sentence: 'Do you always catch such an early train?' asked the inspector.

data.Sentence_cn: “当然是的，”那人回答。“我必须在10点钟上班，我的雇主会证明我是按时到了那儿的。”
data.Sentence: 'Of course I do,' answered the man. 'I must be at work at 10 o'clock. My employer will confirm that I was there on time.'

data.Sentence_cn: “晚一点儿的车也能送您按时上班吗？”
data.Sentence: 'Would a later train get you to work on time?' asked the inspector.

data.Sentence_cn: “我认为可以，但我从来不乘晚一点儿的车。”
data.Sentence: 'I suppose it would, but I never catch a later train.'
'At what time did you arrive at the station?'

data.Sentence_cn: “7点50分。我买了张报纸，等着车来。”
data.Sentence: 'At ten to eight. I bought a paper and waited for the train.'

data.Sentence_cn: “您没有注意到有什么异常情况发生吗？”

data.Sentence: 'that you are not telling the truth.

data.Sentence_cn: 您乘的不是8点钟的火车，而是8点25分的，这次车同样能使您按时上班。
data.Sentence: I suggest that you did not catch the 8 o'clock train, but that you caught the 8.25 which would still get you to work on time.

data.Sentence_cn: 您看，在凶杀发生的那天早晨，8点钟的那次车根本没有发。
data.Sentence: You see, on the morning of the murder, the 8 o'clock train did not run at all.

data.Sentence_cn: 它在芬格林车站出了故障而被取消了。”
data.Sentence: It broke down at Ferngreen station and was taken off the line.'

title.title_cn: 极好的不在犯罪现场的证据
title.title: A perfect alibi
